      # Run PMD scan
      - name: 'Run PMD scan'
        id: pmd_sarif
        run: ~/pmd/bin/pmd check --dir force-app --rulesets config/pmd/ruleset.xml --format sarif --report-file pmd-cli-report.sarif --cache .pmdCache --no-progress --no-fail-on-violation --no-fail-on-error

      - name: Upload violations file in SARIF format
        uses: github/codeql-action/upload-sarif@v3
        with:
          sarif_file: pmd-cli-report.sarif
          category: PMD analysis

      - name: Upload violations file
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          path: pmd-cli-report.sarif
          name: pmd-cli-report
          compression-level: 0

      - name: 'Run PMD scan to CSV'
        id: pmd_csv
        if: always()
        run: |
          ~/pmd/bin/pmd check --dir force-app --rulesets config/pmd/ruleset.xml --format csv --report-file pmd.csv --cache .pmdCache --no-progress --property package=false --property ruleSet=false --property problem=false --no-fail-on-violation --no-fail-on-error --relativize-paths-with force-app --show-suppressed --property linePrefix=L

      - name: Read CSV
        id: csv
        uses: juliangruber/read-file-action@v1
        with:
          path: ./pmd.csv

      - name: Create MD
        uses: petems/csv-to-md-table-action@master
        id: csv-table-output
        with:
          csvinput: ${{ steps.csv.outputs.content }}
      - name: Step Table
        id: md_to_output
        run: |
          echo "${{steps.csv-table-output.outputs.markdown-table}}" >> $GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY
